Type Method# buildBlock(_:_:)

iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+visionOSwatchOS 9.0+

```
static func buildBlock<C0, DefaultSummary>(
    _ c0: C0,
    _ default: ParameterSummaryDefaultCaseCondition<Intent, Value, DefaultSummary>
) -> ParameterSummaryTupleCaseCondition<Intent, Value, (C0, ParameterSummaryDefaultCaseCondition<Intent, Value, DefaultSummary>)> where Intent == C0.Intent, C0 : _ParameterSummarySwitchCase, DefaultSummary : ParameterSummary
```

Available when `Intent` conforms to `AppIntent` and `Value` conforms to `_IntentValue`.## [See Also](/documentation/AppIntents/ParameterSummaryCaseBuilder/buildBlock(_:_:)#see-also)

### [Building switch statement cases](/documentation/AppIntents/ParameterSummaryCaseBuilder/buildBlock(_:_:)#Building-switch-statement-cases)
